resources.string: Nie możesz określić utrzymania nawyku podczas jego edycji
Wciśnij przycisk Zawróć aby oznaczyć nawyk jako utrzymany; domyślne wartości zostaną przyjęte dla pytań
"Docelowa ilość dni utrzymania nawyku w okresie: "
There are no habit parameters or all of them have no values
There is no data about habits
Statistics and predictions of habit parameters
Reminder will be triggered everyday on a time of day picked by the user. Note that if you pick a time earlier than the current one, reminder will be triggered on the next day.
You can\'t add more habit parameters (maximum of %s)

In this period:
Habit was marked %s times
Habit was skipped %s times
Habit was marked done well %s times
Habit was marked done not well %s times

Percentage of times in which it was marked done well: %s
Percentage of times it was skipped: %s
Habit will be evaluated every %s marked day/days\nHabit is expected to be marked well in at least %s days in this period
Count of days when user wants to skip habit
You may not be able to accomplish given marking count with given skip count. Consider skipping less days or extending the evaluation period.
You missed %d days; application marked them as skipped
"Tap Back button to cancel marking task; note that reminder is canceled "
There is no habit parameters to gather values from the user
Uwaga: liczba dni do pominięcia nie jest wymuszana przez aplikację; aplikacja wymaga od użytkownika oznaczenia nawyku jako utrzymanego podaną ilość dni
